hWYjzQbaQi84v9AF9WusZg.text: Who doesn't like half price apps for happy hr! They keep the portion sizes the same, so you're really getting a deal. Plus what Beats a 29 man beer!

-N5J_PHcBLTJfrQxBJzdjg.text: I called in at 10:30 PM and was told the kitchen is open until 11 PM. I showed up five minutes later at 10:35 PM and the girl behind the counter said the kitchen was already closed. I told her that I had just called in and they said it was open until 11 so she said "let me go check". She came back to tell me "yeah sorry the kitchen is closed." That's an unacceptable way to run a business.

LAhLCarbN4hX0X8BBgzmsg.text: One nice thing about this place is the ice cold beer, but they need more selections on their draft beers. The food is alright and the servers/bartenders are great. They need to improve their food menu other than that is a okay place to have beer.

toQQlsPqYI5qKpdhK4YR1g.text: To be frank I wasn't impressed by the fact that it was really dirty out in front of the door and only the bartenders were at the bar as far as the staff that was there when we arrived. But I have to say that the girls that worked the bar were super great about taking care of us even tho it was late and it makes sense to only keep them around seeing as they prob don't get any people like us that couldn't sit at the bar pass 12 midnight. I was honestly impressed that they were as attentive as they were. The manager came out and waited on us which was super nice of her to do. Overall aside from all the cigs that were out front I must say that I really enjoyed my experience there and look forward to coming again. It was our first time. The girls were really hot too so that was a plus. But the food was good and we were both stuffed beyond stuffed. Keep up the good work ladies looking forward to seeing you again soon I hope.

_sV3LIb-oavTNIvW7sfhyw.text: We've been here twice now. The servers are very sweet and obviously good looking. But they have yet to get our orders correct.   The first time, we sat at the bar. There were about 10 other people there. It took a solid 5 minutes to be greeted. Once we ordered our food, she read back the wrong order. We corrected her, and the food still came out wrong.   The second time we went with another couple. Again, our server was super sweet, but knew nothing about beer (asked us what a wheat beer is). And, once again, our food came out incorrectly.   It's a great atmosphere. Nice, open space. TVs everywhere (and I mean everywhere). Not too loud. But the service has GOT to get better. I have a feeling they hired a lot of girls with zero service experience, which is fine. But you've got to train them not only on beer basics, but how to take an order correctly.

3Qys9ysLms4A7LB6feIqsw.text: I had a blast at the Twin Peaks strip location for my birthday last year, so I was so excited to have a new location opening up closer to my house. Well, they have a lot of work to do if they want my business back. So disappointing.  Decided to plan a going away function from my job the week they opened. A friend and coworker (yes we are in the industry) called in advance and spoke to the manager who told her that there was nothing we could do, it was first come first serve. Correct me if I'm wrong, but if a large party of industry professionals want to go there, spend a lot of money, and have a good time, you should probably make an accommodation.   When we arrived they ended us giving us the whole patio area which was a nice gesture. It was a chilly evening but there is a fireplace so we took that so we could all be together. We had a great night up until the end when we were settling the bills. Obviously this was a complicated process because there were so many of us, but in the beginning of the night, they assured us that everything was fine and we would just take care of it at the end. There was about $60 that was not accounted for. My boyfriend (a restaurant manager) spoke to their manager who basically said: "somebody's gotta pay for it!". Not the correct solution sir. Especially because I'm almost positive that the check in question was paid for at the bar. Apologize, take your $60 loss and make us happy so you don't receive reviews like this.   My boyfriend emailed their customer service department the next day and has still not received a response. Not good for building a loyal customer base. Good luck!

hMA8kRaAR67H6LZ_0WLcnw.text: Been coming here since it opened, and still love it. The food is consistent and above average, but let's face it, I don't come here for the food. The beer is icy cold and the servers are hot and bubbly! Charlene and Kat (at the bar) are awesome! Go see 'em.

WmyF9Rx7pxh8ZwrHlQTMgg.text: This is a BREASTaurant    - Hooters with a mountain theme.  I already know this will be a sausage (venison?) fest with exclusively miserable husbands at the bar escaping with sports.  Ok this is where they started and went downhill from there.  1 - no gaming - good luck in Vegas franchise from Texas!  2 - young pups (hired for hair and implants and are exactly 21) who don't know how to pour a Manhattan or hold a crowd (lots if standing around and pouting).  3- supposed to be sexy but exactly one skinny body type - no bum no body diversity.  4.  Food sucked and was $$!   Beer slushies and wings on par with Denny's - yum yum.   This place has been 4 different concepts and this will die out soon too.  There is nothing at all interesting with food, beer, or girls.  The girls are sweet but this is a hot mess of trying to be sexy when we see more on billboards here!  Alienating 50 percent of the population with SIT2P bathrooms and terrible service to females as evidenced by many Yelp reviews in other cities -- not smart!   Ok I got accused of being jealous by a fellow Yelper.  Not True- there are lots of places with sexy gals that I love (PT's Gold, Treasures ;) but you also need to be a good bartender!  If you don't know where Firestone beer is from or where you get the venison in the chili from you are just eye candy.  There is nothing wrong with being sexy but if this is a dining spot and not a strip club then act like it!!  Food and service was worse than Hooters - I didn't know that was possible.  You don't really come to a place like this for anything but the girls. Unimpressed.  Grapes on a celery.  No curves :(  Arkansas Times agrees with me.  Epic bad.  They called it, "The worst most apathetic swill I've ever eaten."  Ha ha ha yep!

SWbrpFtiLV2cKcEjgKjuEg.text: Great food and atmosphere!  They always have specials and themed days.  One of the best BLT's in town.  Better ambiance than the other themed "breastraunts".  Never a long wait and easy to get to.

photos.caption: Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States. Nacho and quest

SbvJD4VjN99psi22Cas8Ww.text: My boyfriend and I went in for a meal and a couple drinks and left raging. We walk in and were sat quickly, but once we sat down we were completely IGNORED, NOT helped once, and not even acknowledged. Multiple waitresses walked past us, seeing our menus sitting out, no drinks, no hello. After waiting from 5:30 to 5:45, we decided it was time to call it quits and walk out. Upon approaching the hostess stand, the hostess and another waitresses were standing there talking. Clearly mistakes were made in the seating, but no one made any effort to rectify the situation. Mind you, the place was not busy whatsoever either. Very annoyed. Very frustrated.

th-M0L0z0L9ugJJsbqnfAw.text: I literally just received garbage for service. My boyfriend and I went in after a golden knights game to get a bite. We sit down on the end, wait 5 mins and a girl comes over and immediately she says "do you guys know what you want" mind you we don't even have a menu in front of us. No hi, no how are you, no welcome in, nothing. So we get the menu, order drinks and were not even given the option of size of beers. The bartender Ravin brings over our check, with no drinks and proceeds to ask if we want appetizers. We ordered fried pickles. A few mins later our drinks arrive from another girl. Before our pickles come out we order other food and she asked 2 times the modification i wanted on my burger because she didn't write it down. The pickles came out and were a dinner size portion with half a ramekin of ranch. We found pieces of fried chicken in the mix of our pickles, I'm vegetarian so that was a nice surprise. We still have no utensils. Our food comes out, it looks to be what we ordered. Ravin walks over and gives us utensils, and my boyfriend said "Thank you" and she gives us a thumbs up. We were never asked how to food was, and if we needed anything else. We put down a credit card while still eating because we knew it might take 30 mins before she actually got to swiping the card. We are both bartenders in this town. This service was actually crap and we always tip way above average. First time in my life I wanted to tip absolutely nothing but still gave her 15%. I will never come back again and will never suggest this place to anyone. I would give 0 stars if I could but maybe the 1 star accounts for the food being some what edible.

Yom8Xw_Qt9yqRaAZZ73lDg.text: I love Twin Peaks!!! The Beer is the coldest, so delicious and refreshing..  Food is Bomb!   Chloe, our server rocks!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States

M_mvqxUYFGA6T96jrL7N0A.text: We just left this sorry excuse for a restaurant. We entered and ask for a table on the patio , the host checks it comes back and tells us she has to clean it off , ok no problem. But first she has to go in the back get a rag clean it , then put the rag away and then come sit us, all this while there is another girl at the host stand that never looks up at us let alone say hello and she is wiping down menus.this should of been our first sign. We get seated, waitress doesn't come over for at least 5 minutes. She was very pleasant , takes our drink orders and that's when it started to go down hill. We order a beer and a wine , some wings and some steaks nachos. It was the beginning of the 5th inning when we ordered, we didn't get our drinks until the bottoms of the 6 th , she comes finally and apologized for the wait. Now for the food , it finally comes, the nachos were literally cold , the steak included. The pile of guacamole on the plate was brown on the outside like it was sittting on the line all that time. Waitress is nowhere in sight so we stop another employee, she apologized and says so many people called out and there was only two people in the kitchen. Ok I get it but why can't I find my waitress either. During this whole time now our drinks are empty and have been for awhile. We decide we are just going to get the check and go. Our waitress finally shows up , asks if we are ok.  I tell her no and we need the check. She brings the wrong check first time around then finally comes back with the right check and says "sorry but you came on a busy night ". What ??? , maybe I should get there schedule and find out what nights they are slow so we can go then. I don't think so , actually I will never be back to this place and would never recommend    11/30/18-  so I posted this first review at least a little over a month ago. Shortly after it posted to yelp the Mgr from twin peaks asked me to email her so we could talk about my experience. I did email her immediately and to this day I have not heard a thing from them. This just confirms my decision to never patronize this establishment or to ever recommend it to friends , Family, or even enemies

uEZbfFbI5EuO98_gLKxMPQ.text: Whoa Dorothy were not in Kansas anymore... eh I mean Las Vegas. We are somewhere between Colorado and a strip club.   9 months pregnant and feeling like a blown up cow probably wasn't the best idea to come walking into here. Of course the ladies were nice and kept saying I looked tiny. Bonus points for that.   Walking in the hostess and waitresses, eh I mean snow bunnies (as it said on the sign) were wearing bikinis and very friendly. Def the place to come if your a guy with your guys friends. Don't come here if your the super jealous time. I am quite content with my relationship and had no problem with the half naked snow bunnies. They actually were cute. I mean, if you got it flaunt it. What I didn't like was that I felt we got less attention and service than the table next to us. The table was five guys drooling over the woman serving them. She would deliver their food or beers and then spend five to ten minutes talking to them. I get it to a degree but I don't like that we asked for a refill on our beers and waited 15 minutes. We had to ask a second time and then get her attention for our bill.   The decor was very cool. I'm way into deer antlers and the rustic look. We even have a deer wall in our living room. The food was good. Reasonable prices and specials. I had the breakfast sandwich. I downed it and asked for grilled onions on it.   This place was mediocre due to the inattentive snow bunnies.

GfSkpe3P5zeDb_t1cHWGng.text: Pretty decent place for watching the game. Each booth table has it's own TV so you can watch the game up close. The service was excellent. Our beautiful waitress, Haley, was top notch in speedy and on point service. Food was not bad for bar food. The drinks menu was amazing though. Loved the liquid marijuana!

03LM84gS2eHRq3ZUf5KKNQ.text: Julia a.k.a. Jewels great service, great attitude and made the experience fun for my nephews 13th birthday.Liked my food too Country Fried Steak.

kU8fHE5Ppk317VRI7grseg.text: Taylor was the best. She was friendly and attentive. We were there the whole night and she kept us stocked and kept checking on us.   Loved the wings and pulled pork nachos.   Taylor gave us a few recommendations and we loved them all.   Love the TP Henderson and especially love Taylor!

ayTmLqrkgdyzQo4Pkzq6tQ.text: Twin Peaks have the best lamps! The waitresses are okay.... food is ehh because I was swatted away from some wings so didnt get to enjoy... Its okay though because really, I was just there for the lamps.

Uf5MU-gDhzpDH3VfQE_obw.text: This is one of the best locations yet. Our server Jewel is wonderful. Fast an flirty. Great service an great food. Will be coming back.

db5yEjeb3l05zJCR5r42uQ.text: Jeesh, I'm so late in trying out Twin Peaks, but better late than never! Of the two comparable restaurants (Hooters and Tilted Kilt), Twin Peaks definitely comes out as the winner!   Of course, the restaurant is themed, so it's all deer antlers and rustic wood, with the cute eye candy waitresses wearing khaki short shorts and low cut plaid shirts. Lots of tvs around and a personal tv at the booths, so definitely a good spot to watch sports.  The menu is small, just expect the standard bar food and you'll be ok. They also have a pretty big selection of beers on tap. I'm not really a beer drinker, but I was talked into getting a man sized blonde something or another, and I actually finished it! Yay me!   The food was surprisingly good, though! We had the fried pickles for an app, and the batter was perfect- not too much, right amount of seasoning, nicely fried, served hot. Really probably the best fried pickles I've had. I had a sampler of the fried chicken sliders served on a biscuit (1 slider = $2). I didn't even know that was an option, but our cute waitress told us. It was pretty good, the biscuit was a tad dry and crumbly, but I liked the cream gravy on it.  My Hangover burger was great! They don't ask how you'd like it cooked, I believe they are prepared medium well done. It was juicy, meaty, tasty- the bacon was amazing, and the egg really added to it. I enjoyed the fries as well, just a little crunch on the outside, nice and soft in the middle, and served hot.   Twin Peaks, i may climb a mountain (or at least a small hill) to reach you! Worth the trek to Henderson for sure!

HRYql-Vx7h0IJElQ9x50FQ.text: Every time I step into twin peaks it's always a great time and great service! The food is awesome as well as the drinks. My server Jacky was amazing hands down! One of the best servers I've ever had. She made us laugh, she had everything out to us, and didn't skip a beat. Even for how busy it was inside she made us feel as if we were the only table in there and paid attention to our needs! My friends and I will be back just to see her!

gPmbOXU9OOUu-6s7YM5FJw.text: The best BLT I ever had! The service was spot on. We did not hit the bottom of our drinks. Julia was a great server! There are TVs all over this place. It is a great place to come watch the game and enjoy food and drinks with your friends and family.

_8eb8jAsMN9PRxg6LXzL6g.text: I went here with my husband to get a drink after dinner and watch the Knights game. We sat at the bar that honestly wasn't too busy. Just about every other 1-2 seats at the bar was occupied. The atmosphere is pretty cool and my husband liked most of the beers they had to choose from. The service however was pretty terrible. Two female bartenders were serving and each time we asked for a drink it took about 20-30 minutes to get a drink or just their attention. At one point we simply asked for chips and salsa. After waiting for about 40 minutes for the chips and salsa, we asked again for the order. The bartender stated the order was never put in, offered a half apology and finally put the order in. I'm not sure if we were given poor service because I was a female there with my husband, and they just prefer to spend all of their time and attention to male customers only, but we won't be back. My husband usually likes going here and even he was really disapponted with the service. I would have liked to come back for dinner one day, but maybe not after this experience.

jtsmkfiuLfJNc6_7mGorLg.text: When my wife and friends was at Twin Peaks Henderson today, we had a horrible experience. In a pretty uncrowded restaurant, it took 45 minutes to get out food and it was cold. Wings, three bowls of soup and a half-sandwich. We sent back the soups and sandwich. When only two bowls of soup came back, we were upset. The manager cam over and told up he didn't appreciate our attitude. I told him they weren't very busy and should had been able to handle our order. Bad went to horrible, the manager wouldn't let up and said we hurt the servers feelings because we cursed. By this time, we'd been there over an hour and just wanted to leave. Never, EVER going back.

DXFw0cweGvIgHeashqYTqA.text: A friend recently brought us here when we were visiting Las Vegas and it has a western Hooters vibe. We came during happy hour so the prices for food and beer was great. I have to be completely honest though, the bartender that night made the best Moscow Mule I've ever had and that's what I primarily drink when I go out. It was perfect. I will definitely be coming back just for that lol.

RPNZiNn-AdNEAz1YpW2Tsw.text: Love the atmosphere here.. the ladies are always nice and they have amazing happy hours. I opted to try the hangover burger today and it was delish. Only reason why I have 4 stars is because they charge for ranch and I barely had any fries and their prices are a bit high. However, the Bloody Mary is really good. If you want a good place to hang out with friends, watch sports or enjoy some good appetizers this place is it. They have plenty of flat screens for everyone to watch.

photos.caption: Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States

ZMi6oFwvQdW_xVUUixB4CA.text: Great service! Renee was super nice and made sure we were very well taken care of. We'll definitely will come back again.

OaiWzN4dInes2uVrt1rY6g.text: Our first time here, came with family that lives locally. Nice, clean place, very open and airy with TV's everywhere, even at your table! Unfortunately, we came during a shift change and our order got messed up. No worries, I didn't need that appetizer after I saw the size of my meal. I had the Spicy Chipotle Chicken and my wife had the Chargrilled Salmon, both very good!  I don't usually order the mega size beer, it gets warm before the last drop but this time was different, 22 oz. of ice cold beer in a frozen mug! Heaven...  We will definitely return when in Las Vegas again.

HsFVOo8gSalR-DkdehsOBg.text: Honestly I dunno if it's due to me being lucky all week but my bud invited me to come check this place out due to the snow bunnies (bikini girls). I was more interested in the food but it was a great sports bar overall. TV's everywhere, nice casual environment, and we had an awesome server who was very attentive. So the main reason I would recommend to visit is because they have the perfect burger located here. Tried their avocado smash burger with bacon (smash I did when it arrived) I almost shed a tear on how perfect it was all around. Besides the fact that I got it medium rare, it had the right amount of ingredients to bring out the best flavor and looked like the artist/chef really was trying to create a masterpiece. Hell even chef Ramsay would say, "that's one bloody good burger now teach me how to make it so I can put it in my f$&@ing restuarant." Not only did I tip the server well but the chef as well. Definitely impressed. Will be back when I visit Las Vegas again.

VFbJ0E-BA5-Lq7k0xzRszg.text: Great place.  Amazing service.  Go see Alyssa. She will take care of you. Food is awesome sauce.  Drinks on point and service is amazing.

zFs4_uSeyFf_t4DXVeC2Mg.text: Visited Las Vegas and was brought to twin peaks. Mariah gave us such good service! She was sure to get to our table fast. I like how she named all the possible cheese choices for burgers, sometimes a guy can't remember them all.    In all, Mariah gave us great service and energy that allowed us to enjoy your food and drinks without skipping a beat! Thanks Mariah!!!

SRG3cBoqjHXXmTy4p8Q7Bw.text: Good service every time that I've been here. Niecey has kept with that consistency very well! We will be coming back here.

pCC2Gzp2tYP3lCGgWu4ozw.text: Kiana was our server, and Tiffany was her trainee. Our service was excellent! Tiffany was on her game and took great care of us while Kiana oversaw her process. I even got convinced into filling out the information card...skilled service with a smile.  The food was great, but unfortunately, my co-workers and I were on the clock and couldn't partake in alcoholic beverages. Doesn't matter, the service was on point and we'll be back again soon. Thanks, ladies!

n0DsWhEuphrAkq0CNpnAWQ.text: Great time with friends! Thanks to SAM! she was amazing , great suggestions and on time service. She is the bartender and server tonight. Multifaceted talent... smiling and always available!  She is a future leader of F and B anywhere. Twin Peaks! Value her talent.

photos.caption: Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States. Outside bar

2FyJLKC2f25kpBqeuGiQuA.text: Another day at twin peaks Henderson and the service is exceptional as always. Rose and Shaneda are my favorite bartenders in town and never fail to serve my beer with a smile on their face. If you want good food, cold beer, and great service, come see Rose and Shaneda at the peaks!!

photos.caption: Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States. Another amazing night at the best place in Vegas

8CD_ET7Etg1BIKtcl5TbKQ.text: Not bad! The food was delicious and they make great Bloody Mary's. It's hard to find a good place in town that makes them perfect with the extra toppings. Prices are moderately fair for the portion sizes. The restaurant itself is nice and sporty. If you request a booth you get a little personal T.V. The atmosphere is definitely directed more to men. You'll find out why when you get there, lol.

KMEHFby1mZAI8UIoQSwlKA.text: Good place to grab a cold beer and watch sports. They have a lot of TVs at the bar, all around the restaurant and even at the individual booths! The beer is served in really cold mugs; they have to be at a certain temperature so they come out nice and icy. That first sip tastes refreshing as fuhhh.  My friend says the food here is really good too but I haven't tried it yet. This place is basically like a Hooters-cabin-restaurant-sports bar. Plenty of men seem to come here for obvious reasons. Not a bad spot to chill though. Gotta love the ice cold beer though!

photos.caption: Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States. Ice cold Kona Big Wave!

ao_ecGbJbKa77kTPKPNvcg.text: Enjoyed the experience here! Food and drinks was awesome and our server, Jeanise (Niecey) was fun and on point with everything. Would definitely come back again.

h5qfFk03pKkyk0VwpLaKfA.text: This place has so much potential. Great big beers, good bar eats, fun concept, and reasonably priced. However the service is absolutely the worst in Las Vegas history. The entire management team should change careers. Your staff is horrid. They have zero customer service skills, and are massively unfriendly. We attended a large gathering for a birthday celebration, and the whole group was disappointed. Several people in our group are servers and bartenders, so we know how to be good patrons. I tipped $10 on a $70 bill. I NEVER EVER tip that little, and it should have been zero. Aren't you guys embarrassed?? No pride whatsoever!

3GZNZE3ZuKh7X5UW3fVezQ.text: First visit definitely surprised tonight; surprise in a good way! Thank you Tyres for your awesome, personable, honest customer service! I will be sure to request your section next time I come in!   So hubby and I walked in towards the last half of the Seahawks/Vikings game. We knew we wanted to go out to watch the Warriors Game, and they sat us in a nice corner table right in front of the many huge televisions throughout the establishment. Loved that!   Our server, Tyres came by to greet us at and take our drink/appetizer order. She's super sweet- again if you come in request her section; she'll take care of ya!   For foods tonight we tried the following:  1) 6 piece baked wings with spicy garlic sauce on the side. 4 stars, the wings are tiny, yet flavorful. The spicy garlic sauce is on point, so good I glazed my ribeye with the extra sauce. 6/$8.69   2) salmon $14.99/ this was really good! Cuts like butter and full of flavor paired with sweet potatoes and a corn hash. Yummy!   3) 13 oz. Ribeye $24.99. I think this is over priced, but at least the steak was cooked right; nice pink juicy center at medium rare. The steak sat atop a bed of steamed asparagus and you can taste the parsley/garlic butter throughout the dish.   For dessert we tried the bread pudding that came with 2 scoops of vanilla ice cream. I don't know how we managed to eat a couple scoops of this because I was so super full. But I'm so glad I was able to fit it in because this bread pudding is divine.   Overall great 1st experience. Although this place was super sausage fest when we walked in, the workers are friendly. Don't let there uniform scare or intimidate you. *wink.

photos.caption: Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States. Bread Pudding; $3.99
Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States. Go Dubs!!!
Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States. 13 oz. ribeye

hG1E7gWtryvNsi9rvywouQ.text: Come here for the beer only  Food is so so  The celery was rotten  So there is no knowing if my chicken wings were bad because of the extra breading on top of it  I guess I'll find out later  Been to this location numerous times  And every time same experience  Bad service  We waited 18 min for our beers in a half empty room  So can't say it was busy  Will come back but just for drinks And sit at the bar area

photos.caption: Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States. Nasty

avH-1YQmuUaHTo1W96foNQ.text: At Twin peaks being served by the best..... Jennifer from the Bay!  Enjoyed the food and her service was amazing! For sure will come back

photos.caption: Photo of Twin Peaks - Henderson, NV, United States. Jennifer from the bay! Best service in vegas!!!

NiMcL9cMAGYEd-7lmdShyA.text: This is my first time eating here, I've always come here for their beer, but decided to try the food today. I had the pot roast on the recommendation of Boe the bartender and she was correct! It was out of the park! I would definitely order it again! And will come back to try more items that I found inviting, like the venison chili.....so if you are looking for great friendly , and prompt service,  with sports and good food....yiu can trust that Twin Peaks and Boe will be there waiting for you!

SGq7lPbACNF4oyDEuOFFKw.text: One of the best tasting meals is their chipotle chicken, really great spice, corn salsa, real mashed potatoes.  Unfortunately the portion size of the chicken is smaller than you would like, smaller than most any competing restaurant.  Half chicken breast. Makes me sad.

Cpbs-9HS0w9wSQ-hiLIejw.text: Last time I was here the service was so bad we left after a beer. The hubbs and I were running errands and after finishing, a really cold beer sounded good. So we popped in. The server was good, we never wanted for anything. We closed out and went to the bar. Alyssa was a great bartender, the manager popped over and sent us out queso dip. It was delic! I'm glad we gave it a second chance! We will definitely be back for the coldest beer in town!

5uRNWloNdVYPpZ6nmMEdpQ.text: Perfect spot for your fantasy draft!! Great deals awesome food/beer and beautiful women!! Ask for Mariah!! Our draft today wouldn't have been the same without her great service, energy and amazing smile!! Will definitely be returning.

TXfmeQ7n4d7QP2-bnD-rFw.text: If you are looking for a place with colder-than-ice-cold beer, you have found your place. If you are looking for good buffalo wings, this is not the place. If you want to watch sports, you can certainly do worse.  Here's what you need to know: This place is Hooters with really cold beer. That's it.

1-hv9yGPV-_dMf9Qek_Ypg.text: Came here just out of luck as we were looking for a place to have lunch.  Didn't know what the "scenic views" were until I saw the waitresses.  Had to chuckle.  Food is delicious, service is excellent and $5 Bloody Mary's and Mimosas and other drinks?  I'm in!  We'll be back for sure.

jjBjvAw7moddLN3XruOoDQ.text: Jennifer at Twin Peaks, best server there! Never have to wait, always making sure we're taken care of, she's awesome!

ONjvguPXrYJYyr00ysoJkA.text: The girls were not nice, the hostess was rude and unfriendly, when we walked in she said you can split a table or there is nothing. I said well how long is the wait and she did not know then she said oh one table opened up on the outside and then when we walked back there was 5 open tables. No one left while we stood at the front so they were open all along. This was my first time here my husband said he was told it was good but I had to wait over 20 min to get the avocado and then was so mad I did not eat anything but my fries. We were never give napkins or my ice tea was never delivered, I tried to ask the girl for my ice tea and napkins I literally yelled excuse me as she was turning her back to me from our table and she ignored me and ran from our table. When she came back I asked her if she heard me and she said yes but I ignored you because we are so understaffed right now and I am so overwhelmed I just can't. REALLY? I will never eat here again!!!!!
